content.rendered:
Directed by Prabhu

Written by RJ Balaji

Cast RJ Balaji (Lalgudi Karuppaiah Gandhi). Priya Anand (Sarala Munusamy). J.K. Rithesh (Ramraj Pandian). Ramkumar Ganesan (Bojappan). Nanjil Sampath (Azhagu Meiyappan). Mayilsamy (Moorthi Mama). Ananth Vaidyanathan (Aavudaiyappan). Santhana Bharathi (Senior Politician). Manobala (Actor Mukesh). Vinodhini Vaidynathan (School Principal).Thavasi. Bijili Ramesh (Drunkard) . Varun Kamal ((as Varun)). Raju Muthuswamy (London Protester)

Languages Tamil

Producers Ishari Ganesh

Production Vels Film International
